Articles.Content:
Panzer VIII Maus,the Nazi third heaviest tank (after Ratte).It has pretty good armor,front has even 3 plates! Turret is functional and rotating,and gun can go up and down.It has 6 wheels and 4100 battery power,plus few couples of generators.

It has over 370 parts.Requires Damned robotics and Firespitter pack.

DOWNLOAD

PS:If someone does a track mod,I have a couple more tank ideas in head...

Edited May 6, 2013 by EvilotionCR2
Made it more historicaly accurate

The Panzerkampfwagen VIII Maus, is actually the heaviest tank to have ever been actually made. And the vehicle you refer to as the 'Ratte', wasnt even the heaviest planned tank.

Top 5 heaviest conceived tanks:

1) German, Landkreuzer P. 1500 Monster, 1500t. (Never built)

2) German, Landkreuzer P. 1000 Ratte, 1000t. (Never built)

3) German, Panzerkampfwagen VIII Maus, 200t.

4) German, Panzerkampfwagen E-100, 150t. (Only partially built)

5) French, FCM F1, 140t. (Only mock-up made)

The Panzerkampfwagen VIII Maus, is actually the heaviest tank to have ever been actually made. And the vehicle you refer to as the 'Ratte', wasnt even the heaviest planned tank.

Top 5 heaviest conceived tanks:

1) German, Landkreuzer P. 1500 Monster, 1500t. (Never built)

2) German, Landkreuzer P. 1000 Ratte, 1000t. (Never built)

3) German, Panzerkampfwagen VIII Maus, 200t.

4) German, Panzerkampfwagen E-100, 150t. (Only partially built)

5) French, FCM F1, 140t. (Only mock-up made)

Ok,I'm not good at history.
